name: Functional Frotran
description: Functional programming for modern Fortran.

name: DISLIN
description: a high-level graphing and user-interface library.

name: f90gl
description: public domain implementation of the official NIST Fortran 90 bindings for OpenGL.

name: F03GL
description: a Fortran 2003 interface to the OpenGL library, along with the GLU and GLUT toolkits.

name: gtk-fortran
description: a cross-platform library to build Graphical User Interfaces (GUI) using GTK+.  Very useful when combined with the Glade RAD tool.

name: PGPLOT
description: cross-platform scientific graphing library.

name: VTKFortran
description: Pure Fortran (2003+) library to write and read data conforming the VTK standard.

name: BLAS
description: application programming interface standard for publishing libraries to perform basic linear algebra operations such as vector and matrix multiplication.

name: CERNLIB
description: The CERN Program Library is a large collection of general purpose libraries and modules maintained and offered in both source and object code form on the CERN central computers

name: EISPACK
description: a software library for numerical computation of eigenvalues and eigenvectors of matrices, written in FORTRAN

name: FGSL
description: portable, object-based Fortran interface to the GNU scientific library

name: IMSL
description: The IMSL Fortran Numerical Library is the standard for high performance computing commercial mathematics and statistics libraries

name: Lis
description: a Library of Iterative Solvers for Linear Systems

name: NAG Fortran Library
description: Produced by experts for use in a variety of applications, the NAG Fortran Library has a global reputation for its excellence and, with hundreds of fully documented and tested routines, is the largest collection of mathematical and statistical algorithms available

name: netCDF
description: a set of software libraries and self-describing, machine-independent data formats that support the creation, access, and sharing of array-oriented scientific data.

name: OpenBLAS
description: one of the fastest open source BLAS libraries available.  Almost as fast as Intel MKL.

name: PAW
description: conceived as an instrument to assist physicists in the analysis and presentation of their data

name: FSON
description: Fortran 95 JSON Parser.

name: json-fortran
description: A Fortran 2008 JSON API.

name: fox
description: Fortran XML library

name: xml-fortran
description: an all-Fortran solution for reading and writing XML files.

name: datetime-fortran
description: A Fortran 2003 date and time manipulation library, modeled after Python's datetime library.

name: FRUIT
description: FORTRAN Unit Test Framework, written in FORTRAN 95

name: Ftunit
description: Fortran unit testing framework by Arjen Markus

name: pFUnit
description: Unit testing framework for Fortran with MPI extensions by developers from NASA and NGC TASC.  Uses parallel codes and object-oriented design.

name: BeFoR64
description: Base64 encoding/decoding library for FoRtran poor men. A KISS library for base64 encoding/decoding for modern (2003+) Fortran projects.

name: PENF
description: Pure Fortran (2003+) library for ensuring codes portability.

name: FLAP
description: Fortran command Line Arguments Parser for poor men. A KISS library for building easily nice Command Line Interfaces (CLI) for modern (2003+) Fortran projects.

name: options.f90
description: Options & input processing for modern Fortran.

name: FoBiS
description: Fortran Building System for poor men. A KISS tool for automatic building modern Fortran projects.

name: Blockit/PyF95++
description: A fairly simple Python framework used to block parse your code (or any text file) into nested blocks. The BlockIt framework has already been used to create a templating capability for the Fortran 95/2003 language along with some language extensions.

name: PreForM
description: Preprocessor for Fortran poor Men.

name: FORD
description: An automatic documentation generator for modern Fortran programs.

name: OFF
description: Open source Finite volume Fluid dynamics code.

name: Unoficial Image
description: docker image provided by @baekjoon

name: The Fortran Company
description: A home page of FORTRAN programming language.

name: Fortran Dev
description: Fortran development blog.

name: Fortran WIKI
description: An open venue for discussing all aspects of the Fortran programming language and scientific computing.

name: GNU FORTRAN Lesson 1
description: Videos about the Fortran programming language.
